name: Phonetic letter counting
tagline: Count letters in a sentence according to the phonetic sounds in the German alphabet.
body:
Phonetic letter counting
========================

Simple scripts for game of counting phonetic letters in a sentence.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/scholich/phonetic_letter_counting/master/letter_counting.html" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
